content: of the foot cut yarn leaving a 12 tail graft the toe closed 44 48 56 60 68 74 82 sts finishing round 1 knit round 2 knit to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 weave in your ends and block your socks sm work in pattern across top of foot to marker share your project with the hashtags #ryesocks sm k1 ssk knit to end 2 sts decrease and #tincanknits - we love to see your knits work rounds 1-2 a total of 6 6 8 8 10 11 11 times this is 12 12 16 16 20 22 22 rounds abbreviations 32 36 40 44 48 52 60 sts bor - beginning of round dpns - double pointed needles foot decrease - decreased k - knit the foot is knit in rounds to desired length k2tog - knit 2 sts together shift beginning of round bor remove marker p - purl k8 9 10 11 12 13 15 sts replace bor marker p2tog - purl 2 sts together this is the new bor located at the side of the pm - place marker foot keep the second marker after the top of foot rs - right side of the work sts in place sl1 - slip 1 stitch purlwise unless otherwise noted continue working in the round keeping the top sm - slip marker of foot in pattern until the piece measures 2 5 3 ssk - slip 2 stitches knitwise one at a time then 4 6 7 8 5 10 from back of heel or 0 75 1 1 25 knit 2 slipped stitches together through back 1 25 1 25 1 25 1 5 short of desired foot length loops st s - stitch es ws - wrong side of the work rye socks - dk facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 4 grafting blunt needle follow these easy steps for success for more information on grafting including a video 1/2 stitches on each check out our grafting tutorial here of 2 needles to get started place half the stitches on one needle half the stitches on the other needle cut yarn leaving a 12 yarn tail and thread through long yarn a blunt needle tail set-up steps insert blunt needle purlwise back toe of sock to front through the first st on front needle leaving the st on the needle then insert the blunt needle knitwise front to back through the first st on the back needle leaving the st on the needle step 1 insert needle knitwise through first st on front needle then slip this st off the needle step 2 insert needle purlwise through the inserting needle knitwise second st on front needle leaving the st on the needle step 3 insert needle purlwise through first st on back needle then drop this stitch off the needle step 4 insert needle knitwise through second st on back needle leaving the st on the needle from this point to the
